feed.title: Postiz Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Postiz: Local uploading, and minor fixes
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: path of contributing guide in PULL_REQUEST_TEMPLATE.md by @JeevaRamanathan in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/320
  • Proxy /uploads in containers by @jamesread in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/326
  • feature/media uploader by @SanadKhan in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/327
  • doc: Update CONTRIBUTING.md to point to Developer Guide [skip ci] by @jamesread in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/330
  • Fix variables injections when building a docker by @nevo-david in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/335

Full Changelog: https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/compare/v1.5.0...1.6.0

entry.title: New release for Postiz: Fixing a failed frontend build

Full Changelog: https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/compare/v1.6.1...v1.6.2

entry.title: New release for Postiz: Fixed file path for upload files
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix file path by @nevo-david in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/339

Full Changelog: https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/compare/v1.6.2...v1.6.3

entry.title: New release for Postiz: Major update for refresh token, mintor fixes
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [AB-0001]: added web ui for redis docker-compose.dev.yaml by @OleksandrKucherenko in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/260
  • security: depbump 2024-10 by @jamesread in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/347
  • Fix: 404 - page not found #353 by @bilalmirza74 in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/354
  • fix: prevent logo height from overflowing into title by @Mujtaba500 in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/363
  • Fix: Change button cursor to pointer on hover by @Mujtaba500 in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/361
  • Fix: minor UI issues by @bilalmirza74 in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/359
  • hotfix: fix refresh mechanism by @nevo-david in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/375

New Contributors

  • @OleksandrKucherenko made their first contribution in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/260
  • @bilalmirza74 made their first contribution in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/354

Full Changelog: https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/compare/v1.6.3...v1.6.4
